Class SpecificExpContributorsViewAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<SpecificExpContributorsViewAdapter.SpecificExpContributorsViewHolder>
      • com.example.appraisal.UI.main_menu.specific_experiment_details.participants.SpecificExpContributorsViewAdapter

  • public class SpecificExpContributorsViewAdapter
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<SpecificExpContributorsViewAdapter.SpecificExpContributorsViewHolder>
    This is an adapter to show the all Users who have added a trial to the experiment (i.e contributed)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SpecificExpContributorsViewAdapter.SpecificExpContributorsViewHolder
